course.title: Medieval Societies and Cultures: Proseminar
course.description: Introduction to the study of medieval history and to the literature basic to the examination field. Readings include both canonical works as well as recent studies. Though designed for specialists in medieval European history, the course welcomes all non-specialists interested in exploring large issues of comparative history and chronological depth.
course.prerequisites: Reading knowledge of French and/or German.
course.notes: May not ordinarily be credited as one of the research seminars required in the first-year program.
